src:
八村、第１Ｑ初の無得点　８分１６秒で３リバウンド、１アシスト

07 Nov 2019

　「ＮＢＡ、ペーサーズ－ウィザーズ」（６日、インディアナ）
　ウィザーズの八村塁（２１）は開幕から７試合連続でスタメン出場し、第１クォーター（Ｑ）は無得点３リバウンド、１アシストだった。
　八村はここまで６試合に出場し、１試合平均１４・７得点、５・７リバウンド、１・３アシストをマーク。前試合、２日のピストンズ戦は第１Ｑだけで１０得点を挙げるなど、１２得点４リバウンド、３アシストでチームの４戦ぶりの勝利に貢献した。しかし、第３Ｑ開始３分で４つ目のファウルを犯してベンチに下がり、第４Ｑは出場機会はなかった。
　７戦連続で先発出場したこの日は開始１８秒でディフェンスリバウンドを記録するなど、３リバウンド。しかし、シュートチャンスは２回しかなく、第１Ｑ残り９分２８秒で放ったフェードアウェージャンパー、同５分２７秒で試みたトップ左からの３点シュートはいずれも外れた。
text:
Yamura, first Q1 goalless score 8 minutes 16 seconds, 3 rebounds, 1 assist

07 Nov 2019

"NBA, Pacers-Wizards" (6th, Indiana)
Wizards' Yasushi Yamura (21) participated in the starter for seven consecutive games since the opening of the season, and the first quarter (Q) was 3 points rebound, 1 assist.
Hachimura has participated in six games so far, marking an average of 14.7 points per game, 5-7 rebounds, and 1.3 assists. In the previous game, Pistons on the 2nd, 10 points were scored only in the 1st Q, contributing 12 teams 4 rebounds and 3 assists for the first time in 4 teams. However, in the 3rd minute of the third quarter, he committed a fourth foul and fell to the bench, and there was no opportunity for the fourth quarter.
③ 3 rebounds, including a defense rebound in the first 18 seconds on the day of starting 7 consecutive games. However, there were only two chances of shooting, the fadeaway jumper that was released with 9 minutes and 28 seconds in the first Q, and the three-point shot from the top left that was attempted in 5 minutes and 27 seconds, both missed.
